<Link id="l00028" /><CodeLine lineNumber="28"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// The object writer contains a few callbacks used by the assembler to allow</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00029" /><CodeLine lineNumber="29"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// the object writer to modify the assembler data structures at appropriate</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00030" /><CodeLine lineNumber="30"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">/// points. Once assembly is complete, the object writer is given the</span></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00123" /><CodeLine lineNumber="123"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  ///</span></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00124" /><CodeLine lineNumber="124"><span class="doxyHighlightComment">  /// This routine is called by the assembler after layout and relaxation is</span></CodeLine>
